name: C-Rent
description: C-Rent offers homelessness prevention services. Services: - ​Financial support through back rent and move-in assistance and problem-solving services to prevent at-risk families from falling into homelessness​ - Case management to help families remain stably housed
fullDescription: C-Rent offers homelessness prevention services. Services: - ​Financial support through back rent and move-in assistance and problem-solving services to prevent at-risk families from falling into homelessness​ - Case management to help families remain stably housed
whatTheyOffer: C-Rent offers homelessness prevention services. Services: - ​Financial support through back rent and move-in assistance and problem-solving services to prevent at-risk families from falling into homelessness​ - Case management to help families remain stably housed
howToGetIt: Please got to https://sferap.com/ to apply for rental assistance and choose Compass as your preferred provider. Please note that you must have custody of a minor child in order to qualify for assistance and you must be a San Francisco resident to apply through this link. If you are an existing Compass client currently living outside of San Francisco, please contact your Compass staff member to secure a referral to C-Rent. Once your application is received, a counselor will contact you to determine if you are eligible for rental assistance and other support. For further information contact: - (415) 644-0504 phone - Connie Swain, Program Director at cswain@compass-sf.org or Zeltzin Tellez, Assistant Program Director at ztellez@compass-sf.org ​ email: c-rent@compass-sf.org hotline: (415) 644-0504 ext. 1000
